metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45941 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libbpf 0.6.0 and 0.6.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow (8 bytes) in __bpf_object__open (called from bpf_object__open_mem and bpf-object-fuzzer.c).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbpf0 - 0.8.0-1ubuntu22.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libbpf package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.0-1ubuntu22.10.1').
